name: Dream Coat Iconic Frizz Fighters Hair Duo Value Set
about: What it is:¬†A bestselling anti-frizz duo with a full size and mini of Dream Coat Supernatural Treatment to waterproof your hair and stop frizz, even in the worst humidity...Hair Texture:¬†Straight, Wavy, and Curly..Hair Type: Fine and Medium..Hair Concerns:- Frizz.- Heat Protection.- Straightening and Smoothing..Key Benefits:¬†- Blocks humidity, preventing frizz.- Leaves hair silky, supple, and glossy.- Lasts through up to three to four shampoos..Highlighted Ingredients:- Proprietary Anti-Humidity Complex: Locks out humidity, prevents frizz, adds shine, and heat protects..- Chamomilla Extract: Protects color and enriches radiance..- Glycerin: Moisturizes for shiny, healthy-looking hair...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, and sulfates SLS & SLES. These products are also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Stay frizz-free at home and on the go with this value bundle. Delivering highly advanced humidity proofing and days of frizz resistance with glass-like shine, the Dream Coat Supernatural Spray is unmatched in all ways. With an ultra-lightweight formula, it transforms frizzy, puffy, dull hair, leaving it silky-smooth and glossy. Its anti-humidity action lasts through up to three to four shampoos. It also gives you built-in heat protection...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...This Set Contains:- 6.7 oz/ 200 mL Dream Coat Supernatural Spray Anti-Frizz Treatment (full size).- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Dream Coat Supernatural Spray Anti-Frizz Treatment (travel size)
ingredients: -Proprietary Anti-Humidity Complex: Locks out humidity, prevents frizz, adds shine, and heat protects..-Chamomilla Extract: Protects color and enriches radiance..-Glycerin: Moisturizes for shiny, healthy-looking hair...Water/Aqua, Dipropylene Glycol, Polysilicone-29, Silicone Quaternium-18, Glycerin, Trideceth-6, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-This spray requires blow-drying with tension to activate..-Shampoo, condition, and lightly towel-dry hair to remove excess moisture..-Divide hair into sections..-Spray liberally and evenly on damp (not wet) hair to completely saturate..-Do not apply other styling products while hair is wet..-You can apply styling products after your Dream Coat blow-dry..-For best results, use every three to four shampoos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I routinely get salon-grade keratin treatments and even still, I love this product while the treatment is fresh to cut down on blowdrying time and to increase shine. I also use it in between treatments to keep my blowouts looking smooth. This is a wonderful value for the price, since you're getting the travel size for free. I find that my coarse, curly, 3A hair is able to go 3-4 washes without needing to re-apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my hair has never looked better and it made it look so healthyüòçüòçüòç

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I first saw this product on Tik Tok and I had seen so many people hype it and review it. Initially, I just thought it was another random hair product that does that same as other hair products. I was truly wrong. I am never returning this product and the fact that I paid $34 for the full size version with a travel size just makes me feel like it was a wow deal (pun fully intended)! My hair is silky smoothy, it's shiny, and it never gets frizzy no matter the weather. If you can get your hands on this set, it'll be the best thing you spend your money on during the Rouge sale!

reviews.review_title: Like night and day for my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin wavy 2A hair that frizzes up easily and let me tell you this is the best product I've ever tried for frizz!! The only draw back is I wish it was written on the website that this product becomes activated with heat so you have to use heat on your hair... I personally try to avoid heat-damage so this is the only reason why im not giving 5 stars
I had such high hope for this product .  I saturated my hair with this product as it said to do .  It did nothing to rid my hair of frizz . No shine . Disappointing.

reviews.review_text: Originally received a free sample but my mother loved it so much she asked I get her the full size ASAP! So happy with this set as it's great value and I love that there's a mini she can take with her when she travels. Removing one star as it contains some common allergens which can trigger eczema flares

reviews.review_text: I have thin, dry Asian hair and it has been super frizzy lately. None of my normal products not doing a thing.. first time used today and I love it!  Hopefully it holds its claim for a sleek 3-4 days of this!

reviews.review_title: A must have for the rest of my life!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best hair product I‚Äôve ever used. My hair is shiny (but not oily), soft, looks like a fresh blow out, healthy, and it last a couple of washes!! My hair has never looked this good. I would 100% recommend this product. I‚Äôve told all my friends about it.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my hair routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My wiry hair is  difficult to straighten but WOW is a game changer. I‚Äôve been using Color Wow for about 6 months and I achieve a perfect at home blow-out. This is magic elixir for hair that‚Äôs not straight. Highest recommendation   Color Wow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so shocked at the huge difference I seen in my blowout after using this product! 3 days in and my hair is as smooth and silky as day 1 without 0 frizz. This product transformed my blowouts and they look just as good at the ones from my salon, just remember to really saturate each piece of hair with the product. RUN to go get this !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm surprised this is not sold out yet? Thank God! Great value for 2 products! And this stuff i amazing!!!!!! I have frizzy hair. I use it on wet hair & then dry & style as usual and maybe add some more on dry ends of my hair. Its just, WOW..

reviews.review_title: MUST ADD TO YOUR HAIR CARE ROUTINE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. Seriously a game changer. I have flat and straight asian hair, after using this product, my hair looks AND feels so full and bouncy! ALSO its absolutely a great value for this set!!! $28 for both full size and travel size???? What a steal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product and value set is a must have for my curly frizzy hair girls! Best results are using my blow dry brush. Can confirm my hair stayed beautiful, silky, smooth, and styled in the humid Ontario august heat, when I would normally frizz up. Will be stocking up on this, hope this one never gets discontinued!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product!! remember it is heat activated. keep my hair safe from humidity and perfect. I live in Miami.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Exceptional bundle for an incredible price. This is my go to holy grail anti frizz hair item. To make it better, you don‚Äôt use it every wash, so it‚Äôs used sparingly and so worth the price tag.
